name: Little Cities: Snowy Islands DLC
summary: Building on the picturesque, holiday feel that Little Cities has become known for, the Snowy Islands DLC features two new islands for you to create on, complete with a generous sprinkling of fresh Attractions, buildings, utilities, and the occasional avalanche! Get hands-on with the post-disaster clean-up by re-building demolished areas and clearing roads of snow.
